masthead: 科教文卫新闻·体育新闻

text.text: OFFICIALS OF THE FIRST EAST ASLAN GAMES WILLMOSTLY RESIDE IN HUATING SHERATON HOTEL ANDREGAL SHANGHAL HOTEL.
第一届东亚运动会官员下榻的主要宾馆是华亭和富豪大酒店。
Mr.Lee: Mr.Smith from Britain will come toShanghai. Would you please order a room for him in HuatingSheraton Hotel?
李先生:英国的史密斯先生要到上海来了，你能否为他在华亭宾馆订个房间?
Secretary:On,I' m afraid we can' iput there in May,because officiais of The FirstEast Asian Games will mostlyreside in Huating Sheraton Hoteland Regal Shanghai Hotel.
秘书:噢，5月份我们恐怕不能把他安排在那儿。第一届东亚运动会大部分官员将住在华亭宾馆和富豪大酒店。
